title: Bloomberg Markets: Trump Kicks off Post-Bannon White House Era
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Trump Kicks off Post-Bannon White House Era
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUEST: Isaac Boltansky Senior VP/Policy Analyst Compass Point Research Discussing President Trump trying to move past the Steve Bannon firing with Afghanistan plan, Arizona speech and tax reform. Toluse Olorunnipa, Bloomberg News White House Reporter, also participates in the discussion.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
